columns.Branch_ID: The unique identifier for each branch.
columns.Name: The name of the branch.
columns.Open_year: The year the branch was established.
columns.Address_road: The street address of the branch.
columns.City: The city where the branch is located.
columns.membership_amount: The membership fee charged by the branch.

branch.table_description: The table holds details about various branches in the shop.

columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member.
columns.Card_Number: The unique card number assigned to the member.
columns.Name: The full name of the member.
columns.Hometown: The hometown location of the member.
columns.Level: The membership level of the member.

member.table_description: The table stores information about members in the shop.

columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member making a purchase.
columns.Branch_ID: The unique identifier for the branch where the purchase is made.
columns.Year: The year when the purchase occurred.
columns.Total_pounds: The total amount spent on purchases in pounds.

purchase.table_description: The table records purchase transactions by members at different branches.

columns.Register_Year: The year when the member registered at the branch.
columns.Branch_ID: The unique identifier for the branch of registration.
columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member registering.

membership_register_branch.table_description: The table tracks member registrations at various branches.
